title: Automated Test Execution Framework
description: Implement an automated test execution framework that runs unit, integration, and end-to-end tests with comprehensive reporting and failure analysis to ensure code quality and reliability.
iWant: an automated test execution framework with comprehensive reporting
soThat: I can ensure code quality and identify issues before deployment
acceptanceCriteria: Framework executes unit tests with pass/fail results and coverage metrics
Integration tests run automatically with database and API validation
End-to-end tests execute in browser environments with screenshot capture
Test reports generate with detailed failure analysis and execution times
